content.rendered:
World Immunization Day was celebrated on the 25th of November at Bangalore. Children under 5 years of age were vaccinated against eight diseases, namely Polio, Tuberculosis, Diphtheria, Pertusis , Tetanus, Measles, Brain fever, & Hepatitis. 6 Bala sevikas, 2 adolescents of Ekatha trust, CHE”S from Kalavathy and Safeena were trained and took part. ANC check up was conducted in the day at Primary Health Centre.

A play titled God of Death was also enacted which was attended by 60 mothers and children.
